content: all bookmarks are worked flat in row except bookmark a which is made up of 6 motifs that are worked in the round surface slip stitches are crocheted on to bookmark b **finished measurements** **bookmark a** width 1¼ length 7½ **bookmark b** width 1¼ length 9 **bookmark c** width 1¾ length 10¼ **bookmark d** width 1¼ length 9½ **bookmark e** width 1½ length 9¼ **bookmark f** width 1¾ length 10 **materials** premier® yarns cotton fair® 52% cotton 48% acrylic 3 5oz/100g 317yds/290m c1 27-37 spice 1 ball will make all bookmarks c2 27-39 hickory 1 ball will make all bookmarks c3 27-36 goldenrod 1 ball will make all bookmarks hook us size f-5 3 75 mm or size needed to obtain gauge notions tapestry needle **gauge** 22 single_crochet x 24 row = 4 save time check your gauge skills/techniques used in this pattern chain single and double_crochet stitches surface slip_stitch working in row and in joined rounds changing colors
